ygData.subject: Re: Level 49 Pet Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: When I logged on this afternoon to Everquest, it said that more necro spells are available from the vendors. Perhaps all our pet spells now ? Macabre, Gneom
ygData.messageBody:
When I logged on this afternoon to Everquest, it said that more necro spells
are available from the vendors. Perhaps all our pet spells now ?

Macabre, Gneom Necromancer (Bertoxxulous server)

----- Original Message -----
From: <srutkowski@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 9:30 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Level 49 Pet Spell


> From: srutkowski@...
>
>
>
> Strange, but last night on the Innorruuk server I found the level 49 pet
spell
> in the Dark Elf Necro Guild. It was in the top spot that the vendor
sells, so I
> don't think anyone sold it to them (why would they- its so rare!). Did
Verrant
> start answering the Necro petition about making our pets more easily
> available???
>
> TearFall
> Circle of the 12th Power of Pain and Suffering
> (and way too young for the 49th level pet spell)
>
>
>
